body.name: WOOLINK 2PCS 4MP Solar Security Camera Wireless Outdoor, 2.5K Solar/Battery Powered Camera for Home Security, Pan/Tilt 2.4Ghz WiFi Camera with PIR, 2-Way Audio, Cloud/SD, Color Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: 【2.4Ghz Wireless WiFi Connection & Solar/Battery Powered】- WOOLINK wireless outdoor cameras support 2.4GHz Wireless WiFi Connection(5GHz WiFi is not supported). Built-in 6000mAH rechargeable battery, the solar camera security outdoor is able to be completely charged through the solar panel or USB cable to achieve uninterrupted power supply.

【4MP 2.5K HD Image & Full Color Night Vision】- WOOLINK 4MP solar security camera wireless outdoor allows you to see delicate images with its 2.5K HD resolution. Equipped with infrared light and spotlight, WiFi camera outdoor supports black and white IR night vision view and full color night vision view, providing you with HD color images no matter day or night.

【PIR Motion Detection & 2-Way Audio】- WOOLINK solar outdoor wireless security camera is equipped with a highly sensitive motion sensor. Once the motion is detected, live alerts will be sent to you via the “HoMeYe Pro” app. Also, the wireless camera outdoor supports two-way voice intercom function and remote access, allowing you to have a conversation between you and your visitor and remotely access your camera wherever you want.

【IP65 Weatherproof & Pan/Tilt Capacity】- IP65 weatherproof solar outdoor security wireless camera is available for multiple places, which can be used safely in regardless of rain, sunlight, or other adverse weather conditions and is able to work in -10°~55°. Pan/Tilt solar cameras for home security can be rotated 355° horizontally and 90° vertically. You can Manually slide the blue button on PTZ page in “HoMeYe Pro” app to realize all-round protection (Auto Rotation is NOT supported!)

【Multi-user Connectivity & Intelligent Storage】- WOOLINK solar home security cameras wireless outdoor support multi-user connectivity and device sharing with cloud storage (needs to be paid) and max 128GB Micro SD card (not included). Video files in SD card can only be accessed in your own account, keeping your data safe. Also, if you have any questions during the use of the solar camera, please feel free to contact our technical support.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 2,053 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WOOLINK Solar Security Camera Warm tips:Solar security camera does not support 24/7 continuous recording, only supports live view and Motion/Human Detection recording. Solar panels should be installed in a place with direct sunlight to store electricity. Supports Android and IOS Mobile Systems.No Motion Tracking! No Auto Rotate!

Previous page Color Night Vision Different vision modes can be chosen as you like. You can enjoy 2.5K HD full color night vision. IP65 Waterproof The weatherproof solar camera can be used outdoors, no matter in rainy or snowy days. Next page 1 2-Way Talk 2 Color Night Vision 3 IP65 Waterproof

Smart Cloud Storage We offer a free 30-day trial cloud service. For cloud storage, you can click "Events" in the app to view the alarm videos saved in Cloud. Cloud storage or SD card storage, you can choose one of them for storage as you like. Classic SD Card Storage Solar camera can also save alarm videos in micro SD card(max 128GB, not included). For SD card storage, you can click "Playback>Local Record" in the app to view the alarm videos saved in SD card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, easy set up!
reviews.reviewText: The cameras work well, they were easy to set up and easy to mount onto the building. I like that I am able to pan the camera live from my phone, and talk from my phone through the camera. The human detection detects humans, but not my dogs, which is great. And there’s an audio alarm option, to help scare away intruders! The picture quality is good if you turn it on HD. All in all I’m happy with the cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything is working great after I bought a longer charging cord. The cord from the solar panel is about 3 feet shorter than my other cameras so to reach my roof where other camera was I had to buy an extension to get sunlight.. It is also a lot better since it had an app update. The pictures are really clear and the night vision is excellent. Very easy to set up and I have not had any disconnections since I installed them. It is surprising being winter it still fully charges everyday. The motion sensor is really good too. Doesn't pick up moving limbs (which is great) but picks up any person, car, and so far a wild pig, coyote, cat and birds! I do wish they came with a longer cord to the solar panel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great. Many Features. Helpful Support
reviews.reviewText: This is a camera that just works. The package arrived as scheduled. The housing of the camera is pretty sturdy. I ran into difficulties setting up the camera so I called tech support and a human actually answered the phone and walked me through the setup process. As it turned out, I just entered the wrong password for my wifi. After I entered the correct wifi password, the setup was very quick and easy.After mounting the camera on the house, I had a lot of fun testing and playing around with it. It had more features than I had expected and the features work well. Here are the features that work very well.1. The panning is smooth.2. The night vision and the flood light features both work great at night.3. The solar panel charges the camera battery reliably.4. The standard definition and high definition pictures both look good in color.5. The 2-way communication between the phone and the camera works surprising well.6. The phone app is intuitive.7. The intrusion alerts offer many settings to help configure the sensitivity and frequency. It has a human detection setting that helps avoid false triggers. Or you could just turn the intrusion alert off8. If you want, the camera can also play a list of prerecorded alarm/message to the person detected to either alert him that he is being watched (or welcomed or whatever you want custom message you record)9. From anywhere in the world with an internet connection, you can monitor multiple cameras at different locations on different wifi networks.Here are some nit-picky downsides to this camera.1. Sometimes I notice a 1/2 second lag in the video stream. But this could be caused by my wifi network, so it may not be the camera's fault. But a 1/2 second lag occasionally is not a big deal.2. You can monitor the camera only from a phone. It is not possible to monitor it from a PC. But you can get around this limitation by hooking your phone up to a TV or monitor.3. Voice recordings in HD can be choppy. So I opt to record in standard definition and only switch over to HD only when I really need it.Very please, especially for this price.***One Month Update****After using this product for a month, I'm still very pleased. The connection to the WiFi is reliable. The solar panels keep the batteries charged. The panning is smooth. The cameras hold up in the weather. Great product. No regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great security camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this camera for my front yard. It is a great security camera for the price with very good quality, easy to setup, pan, zoom, and talk features. One aspect that I particularly like is the Micro SD Card. Overall, it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these cameras. The picture is very clear. And the intercom works really well. The speakers are pretty loud. And it picks up movement well.The app is easy to use.I love that there’s no need to run wires as this is solar power.And the battery holds up great! I unplugged the camera from the solar panel for 2 whole days and only lost 30 battery life.Highly recommend these cameras.I plan to buy more for my business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome solar panel camera
reviews.reviewText: Camera is very easy to install and works great! I bought it for security of my front yard and vehicles. I also like it cause it has a speaker and can talk thru it from my phone. The app is easy to install and work. I also like it cause even if I'm not home I can see what's going on..very happy with my camera!! And also the picture is very clear..Looking forward to getting another one for my back yard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear video footage
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the WOOLINK 4MP Solar Security Camera for my outdoor surveillance needs, and I couldn't be happier with its performance. This camera offers a fantastic combination of high-resolution video quality, convenient solar charging, and versatile pan/tilt capabilities.First and foremost, the 4MP resolution delivers crisp and clear video footage, allowing me to see even the smallest details in my outdoor space. The image quality is impressive, whether it's daytime or nighttime, thanks to the camera's excellent night vision. The 2.5K resolution truly stands out, making it easy to identify people or objects in the footage.One of the standout features of this camera is its solar charging capability. The built-in solar panel keeps the camera's rechargeable battery powered, eliminating the need for frequent battery replacements or the hassle of running power cables. This eco-friendly and cost-effective solution not only saves me money but also reduces my carbon footprint.The pan/tilt functionality is another highlight. I can remotely control the camera's view, adjusting it to capture specific areas of interest. This feature provides me with a broader perspective of my property, ensuring that I don't miss any activity. The camera's responsiveness and smooth movement make it easy to position precisely where I want it.Overall, is an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their outdoor security. With its top-notch video quality, solar charging, and pan/tilt capabilities, it offers comprehensive coverage and peace of mind. I highly recommend this camera to anyone in need of a reliable and convenient outdoor security solution.
